### Soil moisture (relative)
```{r}
df_eval <-NULL
for(i in 1:nrow(df_site)) {
    v<-medfate::evaluation_stats(df_site$Result[[i]], df_site$SiteData[[i]]$measuredData, type= "REW")
    if(is.null(df_eval)) df_eval <- v
    else df_eval <- cbind(df_eval, v)
}
df_all_REW <- cbind(df_site[,c("Site", "Mode")], as.data.frame(t(df_eval)))
row.names(df_all_REW)<- NULL
df_all_REW |> 
  kbl() |>
  kable_styling()
```


```{r, fig.height=3, fig.width=8, fig.align="center"}
pa<-medfate::evaluation_plot(df_site$Result[[1]], df_site$SiteData[[1]]$measuredData, type= "REW", plotType = "scatter")+labs(subtitle="Granier")+xlab("Modelled REW (%)")+ylab("Observed REW (%)")
pb<-medfate::evaluation_plot(df_site$Result[[2]], df_site$SiteData[[2]]$measuredData, type= "REW", plotType = "scatter")+labs(subtitle="Sperry")+xlab("Modelled REW (%)")+ylab("Observed REW (%)")
pc<-medfate::evaluation_plot(df_site$Result[[3]], df_site$SiteData[[3]]$measuredData, type= "REW", plotType = "scatter")+labs(subtitle="Sureau")+xlab("Modelled REW (%)")+ylab("Observed REW (%)")
cowplot::plot_grid(pa,pb,pc, ncol = 3)
```

```{r, fig.height=3, fig.width=9, fig.align="center"}
eval_table_granier <- medfate::evaluation_table(df_site$Result[[1]], df_site$SiteData[[1]]$measuredData, type= "REW")
eval_table_sperry <- medfate::evaluation_table(df_site$Result[[2]], df_site$SiteData[[2]]$measuredData, type= "REW")
eval_table_sureau <- medfate::evaluation_table(df_site$Result[[3]], df_site$SiteData[[3]]$measuredData, type= "REW")
eval_all <- eval_table_granier[,c(1,2)]
eval_all$Granier <- eval_table_granier$Modelled
eval_all$Sperry <- eval_table_sperry$Modelled
eval_all$Sureau <- eval_table_sureau$Modelled
eval_all_long <- eval_all |>
  tidyr::pivot_longer(cols = 2:5, names_to = "Mode", values_to="REW") |>
  dplyr::mutate(Mode = factor(Mode, levels = c("Observed", "Granier", "Sperry", "Sureau")))
ggplot(eval_all_long, mapping = aes(x=Dates, y=REW))+
  geom_line(mapping=aes(col = Mode, alpha = Mode))+
  geom_point(aes(x= Dates, y=REW), size = 0.5, data = eval_all_long[eval_all_long$Mode=="Observed",])+
  scale_alpha_manual("", values=c(0.8,0.5,0.5,0.5))+
  scale_color_manual("",values = c("black", "red", "green", "blue"))+
  ylab("Relative extractable water (%)")+xlab("")+
  theme_bw()
```
